title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. The focus caret should be in the first Combo 'Host:'.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo.
